aboutMe.me: Elara Damasceno Leme - Ribeirão Preto - São Paulo.
aboutMe.details: Graduated in Game Design and Analysis and Systems Development, I have been working in the Front-End area since 2018. In addition to having served as a technical leader in Front-End projects, since 2022 I have been working as a FullStack, expanding my experience. I have skills in:
aboutMe.conclusion: I also have experience with Agile methodologies and I'm passionate about web development.

companies.name: IBM
companies.description: At IBM, I work as a Full Stack Developer on the consulting team, where I utilize a variety of technologies for development, including React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Sass on the front-end, and Node.js, Express, Fastify, and MongoDB on the back-end. Additionally, I also employ Git Flow and agile methodologies.

companies.name: Lecom Technology
companies.description: I worked as a Senior Front-End on the main product of BPM company, using technologies such as React.js, Vue.js, HTML5, CSS3, GitFlow, and Agile Scrum.

companies.name: KZAS
companies.description: As a Mid-Level Front-End at Kzas, I had the opportunity to develop projects from scratch, including the startup's main website and a complementary web application. I used technologies such as Nuxt.js, prioritizing SEO, implementing a Design System, JavaScript ES6, Tailwind CSS, and Git Flow.

companies.name: Lecom Technology
companies.description: I began my professional journey working as a QA (Quality Assurance), where I automated tests using Selenium (WebDriver and IDE). Later, I transitioned to Front-End development, starting with maintenance on the main product and progressing to the creation of new features. I used technologies such as React.js, Vue.js, Material Design, CSS3, JavaScript ES6, and followed agile methodologies like Git Flow and Scrum.
